existing_features.title: Increase the border prominence (slightly thicker and more visually distinct, while staying consistent with the existing theme) for ONLY the selected 'Compare Progress' outline button at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/button[1] (implemented in CalendarView).

Increase the border prominence (slightly thicker and more visually distinct, while staying consistent with the existing theme) for ONLY the selected main calendar element at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[1]/div[1] (the fullscreen calendar container/component in CalendarView).

new_feature_requests.summary: Make the borders of the button and the calendar slightly more prominent

projectName: Make CalendarView button and calendar borders slightly more prominent
